00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include "../Container/Connection.hpp"
00020 #include "../DelegateN/Delegate0.hpp"
00021 
00022 class Foo
00023 {
00024   public:
00025   void Print(){std::cout << "Did you know some Foobar, today?" << std::endl;}
00026 };
00027 
00028 int main()
00029 {
00030   Foo obj;
00031   DL::Connection con(DL::create_delegate(obj,&Foo::Print));
00032   con.emit();  
00033   con.enable(false);
00034   con.emit();  
00035   con.enable(true);
00036   con.emit();  
00037 }
